name: reserve-a-seat-for-the-talks-and-attend-a-workshop--carole-chaney;issue-jira-6-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-02-register-registrationto-the-conference-capability-features-02-register-theme-features
title: Reserve a seat for the talks and attend a workshop (Carole Chaney)

testSteps.description: Given that Carole Chaney gets access to the ticket reservation page

children.description: Carole Chaney visits the conference page
Carole Chaney opens the browser at "/"
Carole Chaney maximises the browser window
Carole Chaney wants to register
Carole Chaney clicks on the Register button

testSteps.description: When he buys a quantity of 4 early tickets for the talks

children.description: Carole Chaney buys a quantity of 4 early tickets for the talks
Carole Chaney buys a quantity of 4 tickets of type early
Carole Chaney clicks on the Talks tab
Carole Chaney enters 4 into the Number of Early Tickets field

testSteps.description: And he buys a quantity of 5 tickets for the workshop Workshop A

children.description: Carole Chaney buys a quantity of 5 for the workshop Workshop A
Carole Chaney buys a quantity of 5 tickets of type Workshop A
Carole Chaney clicks on the Workshops tab
Carole Chaney enters 5 into the Number of Workshop A Tickets field

testSteps.description: And he fills the registration form with his personal info: Carole Chaney, mcdonaldBishop, mcdonaldbishop@vendblend.com, 03/10/1982, ORONOKO, 428 Essex Street - Gibbsville - New York - 9566, Bangor, 50633, Turkey

children.description: Carole Chaney fills the registration form with his Carole Chaney, mcdonaldBishop, mcdonaldbishop@vendblend.com, 03/10/1982, ORONOKO, 428 Essex Street - Gibbsville - New York - 9566, Bangor, 50633, Turkey
Carole Chaney scrolls to the Continue button of the tickets section
Carole Chaney clicks on the Continue button of the tickets section
Carole Chaney enters Carole Chaney into the Actor's Fullname
Carole Chaney enters mcdonaldBishop into the Actor's Nickname
Carole Chaney enters mcdonaldbishop@vendblend.com into the Actor's Email
Carole Chaney picks the date 3/10/1982 on the Actor's Date of Birth
Carole Chaney enters ORONOKO into the Actor's Company
Carole Chaney enters 428 Essex Street - Gibbsville - New York - 9566 into the Actor's Address
Carole Chaney enters Bangor into the Actor's City
Carole Chaney enters 50633 into the Actor's Zip
Carole Chaney selects "Turkey" from the Actor's Country
Carole Chaney clicks on the Continue button of the registration form

testSteps.description: Then he sees the message 'Thank you to have been registered to the AT conference'

children.description: Carole Chaney checks the text of the Thanking message for the registration
